Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from HSV ribonucleotide reductase subunit 2)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.3040743]Herpes simplex virus type 1:inhibition of HSV-1 ribonucleotide reductase activity(IC50=190 ÂµM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry

Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide inhibits the activity of ribonucleotide rductase.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity studies on synthetic peptides inhibiting herpes simplex virus ribonucleotide reductase.
Literature.Author: Gaudreau P, Michaud J, Cohen EA, Langelier Y, Brazeau P.
